replies.author: 楠木i
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 1957863988 于 2018-8-14 13:35 编辑 

请将编码改为ANSI试试看
如果不行就试 UTF-8 试试
[18:55:28] [Server thread/ERROR]: [BossShop] Invalid Configuration! File: /shops/主菜单2.yml Cause: unacceptable character '?' (0xFFFD) special characters are not allowed
in "<string>", position 14

replies.author: xiao_ju_hao
replies.txt_content: 编码错误，转码就可以吧

replies.author: X_Wu~~~
replies.txt_content: 编码没错吧，记事本打开来是中文的

replies.author: X_Wu~~~
replies.txt_content: 支持的，我其中有一个就可以

replies.author: Wither_jun
replies.txt_content:
Server thread/ERROR]: [BossShop] Invalid Configuration! File: /shops/主菜单2.yml Cause: unacceptable character '?' (0xFFFD) special characters are not allowed
in "<string>", position 14 这行说明了原因 在主菜单2这个菜单内的第14行 有一个不能被识别的符号 把这个处理掉就不会报错了
